column4: hi all when i want to play a file on vlc it closes down this is the error in terminal i will use pastebin http://www.pastebin.ca/833802
hi all when i want to play a file on vlc it closes down this is the error in terminal i will use pastebin http://www.pastebin.ca/833802
hello can i get some help
i want to play a movie on vlc i get this errorhttp://www.pastebin.ca/833802
why is vlc using oss instead of ALSA directly?
type 'lsof /dev/dsp' in your shell and pastebin the output
okay... do you have aoss installed? just try running 'which aoss'
if you do, you can 'wrap' vlc in aoss by running 'aoss vlc <your options>' and it might work okay
that's fine, just sudo apt-get install alsa-oss
alternatively you can configure vlc to talk with esd, probably
you appear to have other issues..
rebooting might fix it but it's better to figure out what's wrong, i think, so it doesn't happen again. plus if you have some nasty permissions issue you might not be able to login again
yes, but you're not running as root, so permissions are still an issue
